charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1101_0100:
One day, [Name:PlayerNickname ] was taking
a stroll with [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="his" F="her" ] Pokémon along the beach when
[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] came upon a peculiar sync pair.
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1101_0200:
The two of them appeared to be roping off 
an area of the beach for themselves...
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_0300:
Hey, you! Stop right there!
This is MY beach! Go away!
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_0400: Uhh... Was I not clear the first time?
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_0500:
The sand here is super soft.
It doesn’t hurt at all when you fall down on it.
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_0600:
So I’m turning this area into a training ground 
for me and my Tepig! Right now! Got it?
We’re claiming this sand!
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_0900: Hey! What do you think you’re doing over there?
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_1000:
Leave [Name:PlayerNickname ] alone!
If you want a battle, you can battle with me!
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_1100:
Hmph... A Starmie?
That wouldn’t be good for my Tepig...
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_1200:
Ugh. Fine, whatever! I guess you can have
this spot, then! Go on, take it! It’s yours!
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_1300:
Phew... I think she’s gone. I can’t believe she
picked a fight with you like that!
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_0401_1600:
I’m glad nothing bad happened. 
But even if it did, I’m sure you could 
have taken them down in a pinch.
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_0302_1700: Yeah. I’ll take care of the next one!
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_0402_1800:
All right! You probably could have 
wiped the floor with that sync pair just now, 
even if I hadn’t shown up.
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_1900:
I kinda wish she would’ve stuck around a
little longer! I would’ve liked to chase her off
with a Pokémon battle.
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_2000:
See, the Starmie I have here is actually different
from the one I used to battle with at my Gym.
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_2100:
I left that Starmie at a Pokémon Day Care for
a little while, and the Pokémon Breeders found
an Egg! That’s where this Starmie hatched from.
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_2200:
It’s not very experienced yet, 
so I want to let it battle as much as I can.
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_2300:
It’s definitely making progress, though!
The poor thing had a lot of trouble before it
evolved, back when it was a Staryu...
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_0401_2500:
Where do I begin? Sometimes it would fire its
Bubble Beam at the ground, and the recoil would
send it flying backwards...
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_0401_2600:
Or it would try to tackle its opponents with a
big jump, only to end up wedged into the sand
because it overestimated the distance...
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_0302_2700: Is it a lot stronger now?
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_0402_2800:
It’s getting there, little by little! We still work
really hard with our day-to-day training.
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_0402_2900: I’m always surprised by how peppy this Starmie is!
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_0402_3000:
It never gets discouraged, even when we’re 
doing really intense training drills. It’s amazing!
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_3100:
In any case, I want to do my best to make sure
my special pal here grows up nice and strong!
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_3200:
I feel like I owe it to my old buddy Starmie
for sticking with me through all those battles
back at the Gym.
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_3300:
By the way, if you ever need our help with
anything, don’t hesitate to ask, OK?
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_3400:
It’s all great training for Starmie in the end! And 
helping people and Pokémon is super important!
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_3500:
Helping you would make me really happy!
I love supporting younger Trainers like you
almost as much as I love raising up Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_3600:
Either way, Starmie and I are looking forward to
having tons more fun together from here on out!
It’s gonna be great!
